description: A fullstack application that allows users to view real-time and forecasted weather information for multiple locations, featuring a custom UI and persistent user/location data storage.

containers.description: User-facing interface that enables search, display, and visualization of weather data. Allows users to manage locations and view current/forecasted weather information.
containers.interfaces: REST calls to backend API endpoints (/api/weather, /api/locations, /api/users)

features: Search weather by city or geolocation
Responsive design for web and mobile
container_details.layout_description: Header with navigation and search, responsive card-based main content area showing weather for selected locations, sidebar for saved locations, and footer for app info.
